title: Band, ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
provenance: ex-collection: Countess Valencia de Don Juan
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Alençon showing floral sprays on réseau with additional floral dots known as semé de larmes (sown with tears). Fond: réseau ordinaire. Modes: Point Mignon, semé de larmes.
